resources.string: File %s is not a disk image.\nContinue?
Save state file \'%s\' already exists. OK to overwrite?
The Atari computer has crashed.\n \nReset the machine or boot another image.
Failed to initialize machine. Required ROM not found.\n \nYour machine change has been reverted.
Failed to initialize machine. Required ROM not found.

Hello,
 
Just a few tips to get you going: 
1) Left hand joystick, right hand trigger (or search button). 
2) Tap the top-right corner for console keys. 
3) Long-press in the file selector to insert an image and not boot it. 
4) Use the WiiController or the keyboard for accuracy. 
5) Hit 'Menu' for preferences and more.
 
First though, setup the Atari ROM path in the next dialog.
 
Have fun!

The emulator requires the original Atari ROM images.

Touch OK to use the file selector to point to the folder containing the ROM images.
Touch Cancel to quit to the OS.

Try the Atari800 site for the XL ROMs.
Valid ROM filenames are:
atariosa.rom - OS/A, atariosb.rom - OS/B, atarixl.rom - XL, ataribas.rom - XL Basic, 5200.rom - 5200
Failed to initialize machine.\n \nRequired ROM not found or path not accessible.

New Features? Translations? Bugs?

Changes for version 1.1a:
This version is a quick fix for a regression to the Anchor Joystick preference, introduced in v1.1.

Version 1.1 changelog follows:
* Fix a crash when sound was switched off
* Added support for .com and .exe files
* Added the auto frameskip option
* Added the new Joystick Grace Area preference
Thanks to the bug/feature reporters!

Changes for version 1.2:

* New disk management menu (long press in the file selector)
* New screen cropping preferences
* New arrow key derotation preference for external keyboards
* DPAD-CENTER and tilde (~) now map to Escape key
* Atari800 core version 2.2.0
* Fix rare sound-related crashes
* Various fixes and improvements

Thanks to the bug/feature reporters!

Changes for version 1.3:

* New NTSC/PAL preference
* New keyboard action mapping preferences
* Added support for Xperia Play fire buttons
* DPAD-CENTER now mapped to Break key
* Atari800 core version 2.2.1
* Several bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for your continued support and bug/feature reports :-)
The current Atari program is requesting browser access to the following URL:\n%s\nAllow access?
Denied Atari program browser request (malformed URL)

Joystick deflections lower than this will not register

Set directory where Atari ROMs reside
This key is already used for another action.\n\nWould you like to swap the mapping between these two keys? (\'No\' will keep current assignments)
Are you sure you want to clear the current action mappings?
Press the key on the controller to assign to this action
Step 1:\nPress the key on the CONTROLLER to assign to this action
Step 2:\nType the key of the Atari to assign to this action in the next box (1 character only)

NOTE:\nUse the hardware keyboard to type in the box. If you have enabled the Wiicontroller IME, please temporarily disable it by long pressing in the box and select the standard IME. The virtual keyboard subsequently will show up when you select the text box above. Please remember to re-set the WiiController IME when finished.
